channel.title: RuneMistPVP V2 - 718 - eco/pk - 24/7hr uptime staff needed!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14bmfxi.jpg[/img]
RuneMist PVP/Eco Runescape Private Server! ----------------------------------------- A slightly modified Lost-Realm 718 source brings you RuneMist RSPS. Using a modified Matrix client to bring the enjoyable parts of Runescape before EoC ruined it!
Current features include: - A prestige system! - Master all the skills and prestige up to 5 times to be awarded the special prestige cape and a reward from the administrators - Extra perks for donators! - A donator points system to obtain super rare items worth bills! - A balanced economy/shop system! Get on quickly to start setting those prices ;) - Super fun PVP with instant switching - Hosted on a VPS so downtime is minimal! - Highscore/Dropped Loot NPC -- See what those lucky people have had dropped! - Great PVM'ing including: CORP, QBD, NEX, GODWARS (All bosses!), Tormented Demons (drop claws!), Gano Beasts, Revenants for Vesta, Glacors, Barrows, Mith drags and MUCH more! - A great server for those who love to skill! Cheap skilling outfits available! - Build that cash stack high! Crafting and Theiving is great to make money with! - Great training spots for you and your friends to work together: Rock crabs, Yaks, Apes + more! - Switch between item looks (old versions and new versions!) - Working Lost-City quest! - Fight caves + Fight Kiln! - Full summoning! BoB fully working! - Duel Arena - Dwarf Cannon Quest! - Shops with all your vital starter PVM gear (Full dragon etc!) - Work to get your Godwars armour and high value loot -- It's not just given away in shops! - Admins that are fun and easy going! -- Drop parties may become a common thing ;) and we are looking for Mod/Support ranks! - Many more features that you've just got to PLAY to find out! More features planned to be implemented just send us your reccomendations!
Come and discover what is hidden deep within the RUNEMIST RSPS! We look forward to seeing you soon.
JOING US AT www.runemistpvp.enjin.com/ TO GET STARTED :)
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/b4bza0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/3evdw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2lk4u4h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ht5w8h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2n21z69.png[/img]

item.title: RuneMistPVP V2 - 718 - eco/pk - 24/7hr uptime staff needed!
item.dc:creator: @runemistpvp runemistpvp
item.description:
@runemistpvp wrote:

RuneMist PVP/Eco Runescape Private Server!

A slightly modified Lost-Realm 718 source brings you RuneMist RSPS.
Using a modified Matrix client to bring the enjoyable parts of Runescape before EoC ruined it!

Current features include:

  • A prestige system! - Master all the skills and prestige up to 5 times to be awarded the special prestige cape and a reward from the administrators
  • Extra perks for donators!
  • A donator points system to obtain super rare items worth bills!
  • A balanced economy/shop system! Get on quickly to start setting those prices
  • Super fun PVP with instant switching
  • Hosted on a VPS so downtime is minimal!
  • Highscore/Dropped Loot NPC – See what those lucky people have had dropped!
  • Great PVM’ing including: CORP, QBD, NEX, GODWARS (All bosses!), Tormented Demons
    (drop claws!), Gano Beasts, Revenants for Vesta, Glacors, Barrows, Mith drags and MUCH more!
  • A great server for those who love to skill! Cheap skilling outfits available!
  • Build that cash stack high! Crafting and Theiving is great to make money with!
  • Great training spots for you and your friends to work together: Rock crabs, Yaks, Apes + more!
  • Switch between item looks (old versions and new versions!)
  • Working Lost-City quest!
  • Fight caves + Fight Kiln!
  • Full summoning! BoB fully working!
  • Duel Arena
  • Dwarf Cannon Quest!
  • Shops with all your vital starter PVM gear (Full dragon etc!)
  • Work to get your Godwars armour and high value loot – It’s not just given away in shops!
  • Admins that are fun and easy going! – Drop parties may become a common thing and we are looking for Mod/Support ranks!
  • Many more features that you’ve just got to PLAY to find out!
    More features planned to be implemented just send us your reccomendations!

Come and discover what is hidden deep within the RUNEMIST RSPS!
We look forward to seeing you soon.

JOING US AT www.runemistpvp.enjin.com/ TO GET STARTED
